channel.title: Comments on: Design Patterns
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Mom
item.dc:creator: Mom
item.description:
Aren't computer translators wonderful?
I tell my students they are not to be used mindlessly.
We did breakfast menus and ended up with one that was:
Coffee Eggs "Here's to a wonderful future."
Mom
item.content:encoded:
Aren’t computer translators wonderful?

I tell my students they are not to be used mindlessly.

We did breakfast menus and ended up with one that was:

Coffee
Eggs
“Here’s to a wonderful future.”

Mom
